name: The World Hockey Championships
description:
Play a competitive real time hockey game, position your player on the ice to take your best shot, you shoot. Play in multiplayer or single game mode, competing with people around the world taking your best shots or making some beautiful saves in real time to win The World Hockey Championships.

Major Features:
CHOOSE MODE - Real Time Multiplayer or Single Game vs computer. You choose!!!
COLLECT CARDS - Collect hockey cards, play reward wheel or scratch cards to earn additional rewards and WIN BIG!!!!
MISSIONS - Only hockey game where each day complete a new set of daily missions, player missions or over 60 achievements.
IMPROVE SKILLS - Level up for better defence, stronger offence, better accuracy or more time to take the shot.
TEAMS - Choose from 16 countries to win World Hockey Championships
LEAGUES - Play in 6 different Leagues to win the championships
TONNES OF STATS - The most comprehensive stats tracking # of wins, losses, shots, shutouts, goals, winning percentage, winning streak and much more

World Hockey Championships is a fun and strategic game where you can challenge friends or take on other players from around the world. You position your player on the ice then take your best shot, then move your goalie to save a shot from the other team scoring all in real time.

++++++++++++++++++++++++

Learn More Great Features:
- Challenge friends or play online against others
- Win coins and bucks by leveling up and cash in for improving players
- Get rewards for coming back each day
- Full tutorial and onboarding for this unique hockey game
- Play with friends around the world
- Play online or offline
- Complete new daily missions each day
- Complete player missions which progress as you improve
- Complete over 60 achievements
- Play Reward Wheels daily to win coins and hockey cards
- Play scratch cards to win prizes
- Play hockey card game to win prizes
- Chat with other players
- Share your victories on facebook and twitter
- Advance AI Bots to match your level of play, very cool stuff.
- Great sound effects
- Play in a full size hockey arena
- Personalize your profile
- Challenge your Facebook friend


PLAY IN 6 CHAMPIONSHIP LEAGUES:
Junior Regional Hockey Championships
Regional Hockey Championships
Junior National Hockey Championships
National Hockey Championships
Junior World Hockey Championships
World Hockey Championships

PLAY FOR 16 COUNTRIES: USA, Canada, Germany, Czech Republic, Sweden, Russia, Finland, France, Denmark, Norway, Slovakia, Belarus, Austria, Switzerland, Latvia, Slovenia,,
